description: The latest version of the app, which helps your entire sales team unlock the full power of Sales Cloud data. With clear visibility into pipeline and historical trends, it’s never been easier to build a winning sales team. v5.0 #050

templatePreviews.description: Start exploring Sales Analytics with an overview of top-level year-to-date key performance indicators (KPIs)
templatePreviews.label: Sales Analytics Home
templatePreviews.name: preview_sales.jpg

templatePreviews.description: Gives sales leaders an overview of team and individual rep performance, including quota attainment, pipe coverage, bookings, pipe generation, closed won business, average sales cycle time, and sales activities.
templatePreviews.label: Leaderboard
templatePreviews.name: preview_sales1.jpg

templatePreviews.description: View pipeline changes for a given period, including beginning and end values of the pipe as well as what’s moved in and out.
templatePreviews.label: Trending
templatePreviews.name: preview_sales2.jpg

templatePreviews.description: Shows how deals move through stages of the sales process and if deals are moving smoothly.Also reveals bottlenecks and exposes at-risk opportunities.
templatePreviews.label: Sales Stage Analysis
templatePreviews.name: preview_sales3.jpg

templatePreviews.description: Use this dashboard to uncover resell and upsell opportunities by viewing whitespace.Whitespace means accounts that you can revisit to create new business.
templatePreviews.label: Whitespace Analysis
templatePreviews.name: preview_sales4.jpg

templatePreviews.description: Sales executives get instant pipeline status. You can view the current amount in the pipe,comparison to the previous period, projected closing, and top deals by lead source, product, account, and region. Also get top-level views of sales and service performance.
templatePreviews.label: Executive Overview
templatePreviews.name: preview_sales5.jpg

label: Sales Analytics
name: Sales_Analytics_Flex
